programme.title: The Inspectors
programme.desc: Addictive series following New Zealands Public Health Officers. A visit to a Chinese restaurant with a history of problems, plus a major rat infestation in one building.

programme.title: Ordinary Miracles
programme.desc: Judge Kay Woodbury takes a troubled teen as a foster child into her home after no one else seems to want her.

programme.title: A Place Called Home
programme.desc: Tula Jetters (Ann Margret) is a stubborn widow who still mourns the death of her husband from years ago called "The Captain." She lives alone in a big beautiful home by a lake, but her independence may be threatened by the reality of her diminished vision. She has resisted change, including seeing an eye specialist. Her late husbands niece Billie (Hunter Tylo) and nephew Dave (Sean OBryan) have a real estate agency and are now pressuring her to go into assisted living. They have dreams of using her land to make a killing in a big land development. They get a county social worker Jan (Rebecca McFarland) involved in evaluating her independence. Into this mix drops a drifter Henry (Matthew Settle) and his young daughter Cali (Shailene Woodley). Restless Henry becomes a handyman while Cali dreams of having a home here.

programme.title: The Day of the Triffids
programme.desc: Sci-fi mini-series based on the classic novel by John Wyndham. Dougray Scott stars as Bill Masen, an expert on a species of plant that killed his mother in the 1970s. The species, known as triffids, can be used as an alternative fuel and help end global warming. Unfortunately, triffids are extremely dangerous. They are mobile, carnivorous, intelligent, and wreak havoc wherever they go. Starring Joely Richardson, Brian Cox, Vanessa Redgrave and Eddie Izzard.

programme.title: Bring It On
programme.desc: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this years championships.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Historical drama series based on the escapades of Marco Polo: an infamous merchant-turned-explorer who travelled through Asia in the 13th century. Finding himself in the upper echelons of the Mongol Empire, the Venice-born Marco Polo embarks on a series of adventures in a world filled with war, revenge, tough decisions, love, loyalty, and betrayal. Starring Lorenzo Richelmy as Marco Polo.

programme.title: Out of Order
programme.desc: A dishevelled public prosecutor attempts to save his marriage and discover who is blackmailing him while tackling the biggest case of his career.

programme.title: National Lampoons Attack of the 5 ft. 2 Woman
programme.desc: Julie Brown stars in two media satires as figure skater Tonya Hardly and as angry wife Lenora Babbitt.

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: Exploring the lives and careers of the well-known and famous from the worlds of music and film, these 26-minute long biographical portraits provide a pictorial insight into the background, careers and personal lives of some of the twentieth-centurys best known personalities and iconic faces.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Cats of Claw Hill is an amazing documentary series revolving around the magic world of cats, their private lives and their everyday routine. People have no idea whats going on when they are not at home. So this series gives the viewers a look at the secret lives of their cats, their scandals, anarchy and reveals cats true faces. The feline lives are filmed from a cats eye view in six different households. The cats do their regular cats stuff, patrol the streets and explore their residence, visit the vet. The series is a great source of informative, scientific data about the complex world of cat behaviour.

programme.title: Deadliest Place on Earth
programme.desc: Australia is known for its abundance of strange and wonderful animals. But hiding in the ocean, the outback and even the backyard are animals with deadly intentions.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Natures Strangest Mysteries: Solved
programme.desc: An informative and interesting nature documentary where experts explain the natural worlds mysteries. Animal Planet audiences get to see demonstrations, experiments and first hand experiences necessary to solve natures strangest mysteries. The experts analyse animal behaviours and unravel each mystery behind these different behaviours. Presenting the series and guiding you through the series include biologist Dan Riskin, zoologist Lucy Cooke, marine biologist Andrew Nosal and wildlife expert Bradley Trevor Greive.

programme.title: Shallow Water Invasion

programme.title: Deadliest Place on Earth
programme.desc: Australia is known for its abundance of strange and wonderful animals. But hiding in the ocean, the outback and even the backyard are animals with deadly intentions.

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Return of the Monster Mako
programme.desc: Shark tagger Keith Poe and marine biologists Greg Stuntz and Matt Ajemain use state-of-the-art technology to try to document a live-predation of a thousand-pound mako shark.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees

programme.title: Cats
programme.desc: Fill your brain with these feline facts as we explore the different breeds, characteristics and temperaments of the worlds different cats. With over 500 million domestic cats worldwide, these cuddly creatures are certainly one of humans most loved pets. Revered as sacred animals by ancient Egyptians, associated with goddesses in Norse mythology and believed to be witchs familiars in the Renaissance era, cats have long mystified and enchanted humans. In Cats 101 we reveal all things cat and, from the American shorthair to the Scottish fold, the maine coon to the Egyptian Mau, showcase the most loved breeds.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That
programme.desc: How Do Animals Do That is a documentary series where experts answer various questions about the animal kingdom, revealing some amazing fun facts along the way. Animals have super powers humans can only dream of, they can do incredible things. The series provides answers to the questions how they do it and why. Find out why moths are attracted to flames, why turtles cry, why sea otters bond with stones, and why dogs wag their tails.

programme.title: Canopy Kings
programme.desc: Custom treehouse builder, Django Kroner, and his team take on a new build in Kentucky. His clients request to get them over 70ft into the tree takes him to the circus.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Expedition Bigfoot is a documentary series exploring the possible existence of the fabled apelike creature. A primatologist, a survivalist, an author and a Bigfoot investigator team up, and set out into the Oregon forests to search for the hairy creature. With the help of advanced technology, like drones, algorithms and trail cameras, they try to find out if the old myth could be true. The series also includes interviews with eyewitnesses, as every year hundreds of people claim to have seen it.

programme.title: The Sharks Of Headstone Hell
programme.desc: Shark scientist Riley Elliot is on Norfolk Island to discover if the practice of tossing animal carcasses in the sea has changed the behaviour of the areas huge tiger sharks.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Meet the Penguins
programme.desc: Meet the Penguins is a documentary that follows the team of the Sancob Seabird Hospital in Cape Town, as they rescue penguins in need of help they encounter on the coast. These experts and volunteers give medical treatment, feed and support the incredible and vulnerable creatures, as they get ready to go back into the wild. Even when the odds are stacked the staff is dedicated to help the penguins get back on their feet. Meet the adorable characters of the penguins, each with a story of their own and a distinct personality.

programme.title: Toucan Nation
programme.desc: An animal refuge in Costa Rica takes in a mutilated toucan and gives it a second chance by making it a prosthetic beak with the help of a 3D printer.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: Wild Costa Rica
programme.desc: Explore the incredible creatures that survive in the wild lands of Costa Rica. From bizarre and unique monkey rituals to a bat that catches fish to a sloth with an unusual set of friends, journey through an extraordinary land where nature continues to surprise and delight.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: When thinking about the strongest and most fearsome predators on the planet, we tend to think of such creatures as lions, grizzlies, anacondas and great white sharks. However, this series aims to reveal how size doesnt necessarily matter as, pound-for-pound, some of the most powerful animals on the planet inhabit micro-worlds beneath our feet. The use of cutting edge camera techniques reveals these minute environments and the formidable creatures who live there. Join our hosts, wildlife author and expert Bradley Trevor Greive and biodesigner Billy Almon, as they travel to some of the most demanding and unwelcoming habitats to investigate these tiny beasts and measure their abilities and make comparisons.

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Extinct or Alive is an Animal Planet documentary show exploring the possible existence of animals thought to be extinct. Biologist and explorer Forrest Galante follows real life stories and visits wildlife locations across the planet, hoping to discover proof that animals such as the Zanzibar leopard or the Galapagos tortoise still exist. Find out if his methods will bring new exciting discoveries. Could animals we think are extinct for a century still be found in nature?

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The Last Alaskans is an American reality TV series following several families and trappers who are allowed to live in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska. Have a close look at their daily routine in the most remote area of the US. Far away from the civilization, they have to deal with harsh weather and arctic conditions, wildlife and long distances without any modern conveniences. Heimo, Bob, Ray, Tyler and their families offer you an honest view of their struggle and thrive in Alaskas untouched wilderness.

programme.title: My Tiny Terror
programme.desc: Attempting to teach some bad dogs new tricks, small-dog trainer Jacqueline Wilson uses her tried and tested methods to get these badly behaved pups to buck up their ideas. These ill-mannered, miniature hounds may look innocent and cuddly, but their behavioural problems have left their owners with no choice but to call in Jacqueline. From biting strangers to incessant howling, these owners are at their wits end, and need Jacqueline to change the problematic characteristics of their beloved pets. American reality series.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: The Presidents Path
programme.desc: A weekly discussion on the US presidency.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: Influential with Katty Kay
programme.desc: The BBCs Katty Kay sits down for in-depth conversations with some of the most powerful and change making people in the worlds of culture, business and science. From world renowned chefs and dancers, to the people redefining the way we think about medicine, business strategy and literature, Kattys informal, unscripted interviews reveal the people behind the personas that are inspiring the world today.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: This Cultural Life
programme.desc: Cellist Sheku Kanneh-Mason was born in Nottingham in 1999 into a big musical family. He and his six siblings all grew up learning classical instruments and appeared on Britains Got Talent in 2015. Sheku first made his mark as a solo performer the following year, when he won the BBC Young Musician of the Year competition. In 2018, a global audience of over one billion watched him perform live at the wedding of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex. Since then, he has received two classical Brit awards and an MBE for services to music, and performed at the Proms every year since 2017. His book The Power of Music charts his creative journey, while his new album - his fifth release - includes recordings of works by Shostakovich and Britten. Sheku talks to John Wilson about the early influence of his paternal grandfather, a classical music lover who encouraged an appreciation of chamber music, including Schuberts Trout Quintet. He also discusses his cellist heroes, Jacqueline du Pre and Mstislav Rostropovich, and explains how the music of reggae superstar Bob Marley has been an inspiration throughout his life.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: This Cultural Life
programme.desc: Cellist Sheku Kanneh-Mason was born in Nottingham in 1999 into a big musical family. He and his six siblings all grew up learning classical instruments and appeared on Britains Got Talent in 2015. Sheku first made his mark as a solo performer the following year, when he won the BBC Young Musician of the Year competition. In 2018, a global audience of over one billion watched him perform live at the wedding of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex. Since then, he has received two classical Brit awards and an MBE for services to music, and performed at the Proms every year since 2017. His book The Power of Music charts his creative journey, while his new album - his fifth release - includes recordings of works by Shostakovich and Britten. Sheku talks to John Wilson about the early influence of his paternal grandfather, a classical music lover who encouraged an appreciation of chamber music, including Schuberts Trout Quintet. He also discusses his cellist heroes, Jacqueline du Pre and Mstislav Rostropovich, and explains how the music of reggae superstar Bob Marley has been an inspiration throughout his life.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Lielākās spiningošanas sacensības Baltijā "Garmin Predator CUP"
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: На вечеринке "Трансгаза" был отравлен вице-президент компании. Раскрыть "щекотливое" дело берутся Никонов, Скребцов и Аня. Но что стало причиной трагедии: любовные связи или грязный бизнес?

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа считает себя виновной в смерти супруга. Он погиб в ДТП, не сумев справиться с управлением. Незадолго до несчастного случая пара эмоционально выясняла отношения. Именно из-за этого муж Наташи в сердцах сел за руль.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа сталкивается с предательством друзей. Кроме того, ее прессуют братки. Она с ужасом выясняет о своем супруге много нового. У мужчины была другая фамилия и семья, о которой Наташа ничего не знала.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташе становится известно, что Тома ждет ребенка от Игоря. Отец пытается ее утешить. Он заверяет девушку, что она поедет во Францию. В это время Игорь пытается доехать до города. Он слишком долго пробыл в доме Томы.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Тамара солгала Наталье о своей беременности. К утру Игорь все-таки доезжает до дома возлюбленной. Ему открывает двери ее отец. Он сообщает, что Наташа находится на пути в аэропорт. Игорь намерен догнать ее.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Паркер попадает в ловушку. Группа Один пытается разыскать его. Похитители Паркера требуют, чтобы он раскрыть тайну из своего прошлого. Секрет Паркера касается восьмилетней девочки по имени Хейли, чья мать умерла во время перестрелки, когда Паркер и его коллеги обыскивали её дом. Похитители Паркера убеждены, что он выстрелил в мать Хейли, а затем заботился о ней из чувства вины.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Роберт Купер устраивает самосуд, после того, как его брат умирает от передозировки наркотиков. Группа Один пытается остановить Купера прежде, чем он убьет кого-то. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Clarence

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball: Darwins Yearbook
programme.desc: Darwin wants to put Alan on the cover of the school yearbook - but Alans apparent modesty gets in the way. / Principal Brown sets Darwin the task of making the school yearbook. / Darwin sets out to find a photo of Carrie for the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin needs to find a photo of Clayton to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin asks Sarah for a photo to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / When Darwin asks his friends which teacher deserves to be on the yearbook cover they struggle to find a single worthy candidate!

programme.title: Lego DREAMZzz
programme.desc: When Mateo and the team play a video game that mimics their lives, they think beating the final boss will give them the key to defeating Happy App. When that proves difficult, they enter the GAME CREATORS dream in the Cyber Realm, where they must complete three tasks in exchange for the secret to beating the game. However, Dreamsmashers replacement, D-Shock, wont let them win that easily…

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Stage Fright
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and the Mystery Inc. crew head to Chicago for a talent show, a few museum tours and whole lot of pizza! The windy city is home to the hit TV show Talent Star, and song-writing duo Fred and Daphne have high hopes of winning. Not to be left out, Scooby and Shaggy have a secret act in the works that they are betting will take the contest by storm. Unluckily for everyone, theres some frightful competition at this talent contest, as the show is being broadcast from an opera house with a history of horrors and a particularly vengeful phantom that has cursed the shows production.

programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.desc: When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesnt get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. Mom explains Yuki Masamis mother is an old school friend and repeatedly refuses to fight her despite further provocation. However when Yuki threatens to get Mom fired from her job Mom has no choice but to partake in a rematch of a karate match her and Yuki had fought as children.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball: Darwins Yearbook
programme.desc: Darwin wants to put Alan on the cover of the school yearbook - but Alans apparent modesty gets in the way. / Principal Brown sets Darwin the task of making the school yearbook. / Darwin sets out to find a photo of Carrie for the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin needs to find a photo of Clayton to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin asks Sarah for a photo to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / When Darwin asks his friends which teacher deserves to be on the yearbook cover they struggle to find a single worthy candidate!

programme.title: Lego DREAMZzz
programme.desc: The team hears a distress call from their classmate Nova! Shes trapped at the school and is desperate for help. Mateo, Izzie, and Zoey sneak their way in and are confronted by the villainous HALL MONITOR, while Oz, Cooper, and Lunia head to the dream world to test a few theories about the significance of "the Wrench!"

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Welcome to the town of Jellystone - a charming place where your favorite Hanna-Barbera characters live, work and play together... but, at the same time, cant help but stir up trouble for one another. The animated series includes classic characters such as Yogi, Boo Boo, Snagglepuss, Adam Ant, Huckleberry Hound, Jabberjaw, Magilla Gorilla and more.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Vs. Teen Titans
programme.desc: Earths collide when the mysterious "Master of Games" appears over Titans Tower and throws the Teen Titans in a fight against their taller, more serious selves. Now, our heroes must set aside their differences and work together to stop him. Its a crisis of multiverse proportions that will take nothing less than two versions of the Teen Titans to solve!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes. / Gumball and Darwin must apologise to everyone they know after getting a threatening message on Elmore Plus. / Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less... / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Tech for Good
programme.desc: Inspiring series following CNN correspondent Kristie Lu Stout as she meets incredible individuals all around the world whose lives were changed by technology. Their stories prove that technologies can help overcome different personal difficulties and enable people to follow their dreams despite them. Technological innovations offered these fascinating people a chance to pursue careers in fields that would otherwise be impossible, such as sports, arts and gaming.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: CNN This Morning Weekend
programme.desc: Start your day with Victor Blackwell and Amara Walker bringing you the latest headlines and analysis.

programme.title: First Of All With Victor Blackwell
programme.desc: Victor Blackwell brings a fresh perspective on the weeks news with a focus on stories affecting communities of color.

programme.title: Smerconish
programme.desc: Michael Smerconish tackles the American political and news stories of the week.

programme.title: CNN Saturday Morning Table For Five
programme.desc: Join CNN Saturday Morning for an insightful and provocative discussion of the weeks biggest stories.

programme.title: The Amanpour Hour
programme.desc: Christiane Amanpour, CNNs chief international anchor, brings valuable insight to the biggest global and domestic news stories of the week.

programme.title: World Sport

programme.title: CNN Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: CNN Marketplace Europe offers unique access to the latest European market information, with a look at latest events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the top business stories that influence and shape the European continent. Have a look at the interviews with outstanding figures of business and industry and reveal the economic trends in various regions of Europe to get to know the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East

Queen Of Meth
programme.desc: This programme offers a revealing insight into the private life of one of Americas most unexpected drug lords, Lori Arnold, also known as Queen of Meth. Reflecting on her ascent from small time drug user to one of the most influential meth dealers in the Midwest, Iowa-based Arnold takes viewers back to the crime scene in her hometown of Ottumwa, where she ran a successful, multi-state meth empire and played a key role in the start of the notorious methamphetamine epidemic. Over the course of three episodes, Arnold will try to make peace with her past with the help of her friends and family, including her famous brother Tom Arnold.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: Late Night Lockup
programme.desc: In Ohio, a CEO goes wild when officers pull him over on a suspected DUI. In Washington, a partygoer bites an officer when he escorts her out of a club.

programme.title: Late Night Lockup
programme.desc: Police catch a woman red-handed, literally, after spray painting a neighbours garage. Then, an Indiana mayor tries to avoid arrest after drinking and driving.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Worlds Greatest Cars
programme.desc: Motoring experts vote on the most distinguished cars ever. Have a look at the iconic cars in various categories: sports-cars with the exceptional design; top hot hatches; the finest luxury cars for the lovers of speed and style; the high-tech cars with extraordinary performance and design; the best rally cars with outstanding durability; and off-road cars, the toughest all-terrain beasts.

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: Hauling a heavy load in gigantic trucks is no joke, and this reality series follows truckers, also known as asphalt cowboys, as they earn their money transporting heavy goods across the European continent. Battling the elements, strict time constraints, and the loneliness of being away from home, these truckers fire up their engines and waste no time on the road, ensuring their clients goods arrive on time and in one piece!

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek finds a 1928 Ford Model A in a car club in Detroit. Then he calls in an expert to figure out why it sat so long and tries to get it running.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek travels to the last standing AMC dealership in Pikeville, North Carolina. He finds an AMC Rebel SST convertible that needs reviving.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People

Take a journey deep into Alaskas bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, choose to live life on their own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates takes a closer look at the Amityville Horror, the strange fate of a Civil War submarine crew, and spontaneous human combustion.

programme.title: Mystery Of Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Locals say that Bling Frog Ranch in Utah is a cursed land, a place that should not been interfered with, a place where strange things just seem to happen. Rumours have long circulated about a lost treasure hidden somewhere on the ranch, and that the mysterious land is trying to hold on to something. This reality series follows Duane Ollinger as he throws everything he has at finding its hidden treasures, but every time he thinks he close, another peculiar incident arises.

programme.title: Alien Encounters: Fact or Fiction
programme.desc: A man shares an original Area 51 video from 1992. Multiple people capture a Texas UFO sighting. A man films a hovering object in Utah.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars

The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs

So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.
