programme.title: Anglijas Futbola čempionāts. "Middlesbrough FC" - Šefīldas “United”
programme.desc: The English Football League Championship or the "EFL" as it is otherwise referred to, is the stepping stone from the wilderness of English football, to the riches associated with the promised land, that is the English Premier League. In keeping with traditions of this club championship, we bring you first-hand, live coverage of developments for this division. Touted as one of the hardest leagues to manoeuvre out of, it was founded in 2004 and has truly delivered with its play-off system, offering a whole new dimension of entertainment, compared to other leagues out there. From "Sleeping Giants" such as Nottingham Forest and Sheffield Wednesday, to the jostling pack of Preston and Brentford, marquee match-ups every week will decide the final Championship standings, come the end of May.

programme.title: Football: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Vācijas futbola Bundeslīga. Werder Bremen vs Bayer Leverkusen
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Ищите маму
programme.desc: В день свадьбы Игорь получает необычный подарок — сверток с младенцем. К малышу прилагается записка, в которой указано, что Игорь — отец малыша, и должен позаботиться о нем. Свадьба сорвана, Игорь остается без жены, но уже с ребенком. Он пытается найти маму малыша, и ради этого разыскивает четырех женщин, с которыми у него были краткосрочные романы, но ни одна из них не признается в материнстве. Так чей же сын маленький Андрюша?

programme.title: Ищите маму
programme.desc: В день свадьбы Игорь получает необычный подарок — сверток с младенцем. К малышу прилагается записка, в которой указано, что Игорь — отец малыша, и должен позаботиться о нем. Свадьба сорвана, Игорь остается без жены, но уже с ребенком. Он пытается найти маму малыша, и ради этого разыскивает четырех женщин, с которыми у него были краткосрочные романы, но ни одна из них не признается в материнстве. Так чей же сын маленький Андрюша?

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Андрей Макаров - начальник экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД. Он и его коллеги расследуют не одно преступление, но главная задача Макарова - найти убийцу сестры.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Андрей Макаров - начальник экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД. Он и его коллеги расследуют не одно преступление, но главная задача Макарова - найти убийцу сестры.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров чувствует, что Богдана по какой-то причине снова стала с ним холодна. Но не знает, почему. Между тем, после "терапевтического тренинга" отношения Макарова с его коллегами становятся более человечными. В гости к Макарову приходит Виктор Берштадский. Макаров рассказывает ему о своих изысканиях, и во время этого разговора Макарову приходит в голову идея. Убийца был очень высокого роста, а в комнате, где убили Ирину – низкая люстра. Макаров снимает люстру, а затем они исследуют ее и находят человеческий волос. Он принадлежит вору-рецидивисту Анатолию Кроллу по кличке "Гоблин". Сейчас он отбывает двухлетний срок за кражу со взломом. После тяжелых размышлений Макаров решает встретиться с Кроллом в тюрьме. Щеглов приходит к Лесе домой с букетом цветов. Он говорит ей о своих чувствах. Лесю это смешит. И тут кто-то окликает Лесю из глубины квартиры, а затем в прихожую выходит тот самый байкер. Щеглов багровеет. Он швыряет букет на пол и уходит. Леся окликает его, но Щеглов не останавливается.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Ида Александровна проникается уважением к Макарову. Она сообщает кому-то по телефону, что аннулирует договоренность. Карпенко в ярости. И, не полагаясь больше на Кушнира, он находит способ насолить Макарову. У криминалиста Ройзмана заболела жена. Ей необходима дорогостоящая операция, на которую у Ройзмана нет денег. Он обращается за помощью к влиятельному и богатому Игорю Карпенко. И тот обещает ему финансовую помощь, но – в обмен на услугу. Ройзман должен подбросить отпечатки пальцев Макарова на место преступления. Жене Ройзмана становится хуже, врачи говорят, что без срочной операции она умрет. Выехав на очередной труп, Ройзман, озабоченный своими проблемами, совершает профессиональную ошибку. Макаров устраивает ему прилюдный скандал. Оскорбленный до глубины души Ройзман звонит Карпенко и дает свое согласие. Леся пытается заговорить со Щегловым, однако он ее избегает. Тем временем, Макаров встречается с преступником Кроллом. После разговора с ним Макаров почему-то решает, что Кролл вряд ли мог быть убийцей его сестры.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров решает выяснить, почему Богдана стала к нему так холодна. Богдана передает ему рассказ Игоря Карпенко. Макаров рассказывает, что пытался прищучить парня-насильника (сына депутата Кушнира) и нашел доказательства его вины. Однако Кушнир отмазал сынка, а помог ему в этом именно Карпенко. Они перевернули ситуацию с ног на голову и поставили его перед выбором: либо он увольняется по собственному желанию, либо его уволят с волчьим билетом. Макаров продолжает сомневаться в том, что грабитель Кролл – убийца его сестры. После проведенного расследования он выясняет, что в день, когда убили Ирину, Кролл находился в другом месте. У него есть любимая женщина – Надя. Она от него беременна, и они собирались пожениться. В день, когда убили Ирину, Кролл обнес дом Надиного начальника – по наводке Нади и с ее непосредственным участием. Поэтому он и не стал ничего рассказывать – боялся "спалить" свою беременную возлюбленную. А вот она, узнав, что Кроллу "светит пятнашка", во всем призналась и все рассказала. Щеглов и Леся вместе отправляются по служебным делам. И, воспользовавшись этим, Леся объясняет Щеглову, что байкер, к которому Щеглов ее приревновал, ее родной брат Остап.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Ройзман, применив свои профессиональные навыки криминалиста, совершает подлог: оставляет отпечатки пальцев Макарова на орудии убийства, возле убитого серийного маньяка, который подозревался в убийстве женщин. Макарова отстраняют от работы, отныне он под следствием. Макаров понимает, что обязан доказать свою невиновность. Щеглов продолжает ухаживать за Лесей. Он снова приносит ей цветы и смущенно приглашает на свидание. Леся, почти неожиданно для себя, соглашается. Макаров хладнокровно распутывает и это дело. В довершение ему удается поймать настоящего преступника. С Макарова снимают обвинения. Он один знает, как улики оказались на месте преступления. Ройзман раскаивается. Макаров прощает его и уличает Карпенко. А затем берет с Карпенко слово, что тот оплатит операцию жене Ройзмана. Взамен Макаров обещает никому и ничего не рассказывать. Карпенко соглашается.

programme.title: Вкус мести
programme.desc: Популярная певица и актриса Анна Долецкая едва не погибает в подстроенной автокатастрофе во время гастролей. Все вокруг думают, что она мертва. Однако волею судьбы женщина оказывается на хуторе местной знахарки, которая ставит ее на ноги. Анна понимает, что за покушением стоит ее муж-продюсер и его личная помощница. С помощью пластической операции Анна до неузнаваемости меняет свою внешность и возвращается в столицу, чтобы отомстить своим врагам.

programme.title: Вкус мести
programme.desc: Популярная певица и актриса Анна Долецкая едва не погибает в подстроенной автокатастрофе во время гастролей. Все вокруг думают, что она мертва. Однако волею судьбы женщина оказывается на хуторе местной знахарки, которая ставит ее на ноги. Анна понимает, что за покушением стоит ее муж-продюсер и его личная помощница. С помощью пластической операции Анна до неузнаваемости меняет свою внешность и возвращается в столицу, чтобы отомстить своим врагам.

programme.title: Я думал,ты будешь всегда
programme.desc: Самовлюблённый мужчина лишь после смерти преданной ему жены осознаёт, что она была главным человеком в его жизни. Он отправляется в прошлое, чтобы покаяться перед ней, а ещё - найти ответ на вопрос, почему втайне от него она пожелала быть похороненной рядом со старой могилой неизвестного человека...

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Андрей Макаров - начальник экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД. Он и его коллеги расследуют не одно преступление, но главная задача Макарова - найти убийцу сестры.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Андрей Макаров - начальник экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД. Он и его коллеги расследуют не одно преступление, но главная задача Макарова - найти убийцу сестры.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров чувствует, что Богдана по какой-то причине снова стала с ним холодна. Но не знает, почему. Между тем, после "терапевтического тренинга" отношения Макарова с его коллегами становятся более человечными. В гости к Макарову приходит Виктор Берштадский. Макаров рассказывает ему о своих изысканиях, и во время этого разговора Макарову приходит в голову идея. Убийца был очень высокого роста, а в комнате, где убили Ирину – низкая люстра. Макаров снимает люстру, а затем они исследуют ее и находят человеческий волос. Он принадлежит вору-рецидивисту Анатолию Кроллу по кличке "Гоблин". Сейчас он отбывает двухлетний срок за кражу со взломом. После тяжелых размышлений Макаров решает встретиться с Кроллом в тюрьме. Щеглов приходит к Лесе домой с букетом цветов. Он говорит ей о своих чувствах. Лесю это смешит. И тут кто-то окликает Лесю из глубины квартиры, а затем в прихожую выходит тот самый байкер. Щеглов багровеет. Он швыряет букет на пол и уходит. Леся окликает его, но Щеглов не останавливается.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Ида Александровна проникается уважением к Макарову. Она сообщает кому-то по телефону, что аннулирует договоренность. Карпенко в ярости. И, не полагаясь больше на Кушнира, он находит способ насолить Макарову. У криминалиста Ройзмана заболела жена. Ей необходима дорогостоящая операция, на которую у Ройзмана нет денег. Он обращается за помощью к влиятельному и богатому Игорю Карпенко. И тот обещает ему финансовую помощь, но – в обмен на услугу. Ройзман должен подбросить отпечатки пальцев Макарова на место преступления. Жене Ройзмана становится хуже, врачи говорят, что без срочной операции она умрет. Выехав на очередной труп, Ройзман, озабоченный своими проблемами, совершает профессиональную ошибку. Макаров устраивает ему прилюдный скандал. Оскорбленный до глубины души Ройзман звонит Карпенко и дает свое согласие. Леся пытается заговорить со Щегловым, однако он ее избегает. Тем временем, Макаров встречается с преступником Кроллом. После разговора с ним Макаров почему-то решает, что Кролл вряд ли мог быть убийцей его сестры.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров решает выяснить, почему Богдана стала к нему так холодна. Богдана передает ему рассказ Игоря Карпенко. Макаров рассказывает, что пытался прищучить парня-насильника (сына депутата Кушнира) и нашел доказательства его вины. Однако Кушнир отмазал сынка, а помог ему в этом именно Карпенко. Они перевернули ситуацию с ног на голову и поставили его перед выбором: либо он увольняется по собственному желанию, либо его уволят с волчьим билетом. Макаров продолжает сомневаться в том, что грабитель Кролл – убийца его сестры. После проведенного расследования он выясняет, что в день, когда убили Ирину, Кролл находился в другом месте. У него есть любимая женщина – Надя. Она от него беременна, и они собирались пожениться. В день, когда убили Ирину, Кролл обнес дом Надиного начальника – по наводке Нади и с ее непосредственным участием. Поэтому он и не стал ничего рассказывать – боялся "спалить" свою беременную возлюбленную. А вот она, узнав, что Кроллу "светит пятнашка", во всем призналась и все рассказала. Щеглов и Леся вместе отправляются по служебным делам. И, воспользовавшись этим, Леся объясняет Щеглову, что байкер, к которому Щеглов ее приревновал, ее родной брат Остап.

programme.title: Jauniņais
programme.desc: Celtniecības darbinieks Džons Nolans piedzīvo bankas aplaupīšanu un reālas nāves briesmas, un tas izrādās dzīvi mainošs notikums. Lai arī Džonam ir jau 45, viņš nolemj kļūt par policistu, lai varētu rūpēties par līdzcilvēku drošību. Viņš pamet mierīgo mazpilsētas dzīvi, veiksmīgi pabeidz kursus un sāk strādāt Losandželosas policijā. Priekšnieks uz Džonu skatās ar aizdomām un neuzticību, jaunie kolēģi - ar vieglu smīnu. Jaunas dzīves sākums pusmūžā nebūs ne viegls, ne vienkāršs, un Džona mēģinājums pierast pie bīstamās, neparedzamās un brīžiem komiskās policistu ikdienas būs piedzīvojumiem bagāts! Galvenajās lomās: Natans Filions, Alisa Diaza, Melisa ONīla.

Galvenajās lomās: Natans Filions, Alisa Diaza, Melisa ONīla.

programme.title: Zem klāja Vidusjūrā
programme.desc: Luksus jahta atkal paceļ enkuru, lai vestu smalkus ļaudis kruīzā pa Vidusjūru - šoreiz Maltā. Kamēr viesi bauda jūru un sauli, ķer vasaras vēju matos, izklaidējas un līksmo, jahtas komanda dara visu, lai nodrošinātu viesiem augstākās klases servisu. Saspringtas situācijas, sarežģīti lēmumi, smags darbs - pēc stresa pilnām darba dienām prasās atbilstoša atpūta. Dzīve noslēgtā komūnā, ballītes un alkohols dara savu - darbinieku starpā ātri vien veidojas attiecības - gan draudzīgas, gan naidīgas, gan kaislīgi romantiskas. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.title: Zem klāja Vidusjūrā
programme.desc: Luksus jahta atkal paceļ enkuru, lai vestu smalkus ļaudis kruīzā pa Vidusjūru - šoreiz Maltā. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.title: Stila patruļa
programme.desc: Katrs vēlas izskatīties satriecoši, taču ne vienmēr tas izdodas. Tam ir virkne iemeslu - nav laika vai vēlmes, nav stila izjūtas, nav īstā diena vai līdzekļu. Tomēr ir stila "zelta likumi," kuri jāievēro un kuru pārkāpšanai nav attaisnojuma - nekopti nagi un mati, saplēsts vai netīrs, neizgludināts, auguma aprisēm nepiemērots apģērbs, pārspīlēti aksesuāri vai tādi, kuri savu laiku jau sen kā nokalpojuši, sievišķīguma slāpēšana zem mūžīgajām biksēm vai nevīžība apģērba izvēlē. Šos pārkāpumus nedrīkst pieļaut pat, lai tikai iznestu atkritumus vai aizskrietu līdz tuvējam veikalam. Tāpēc Latvijas vadošie stilisti Žanna Dubska, Aleksandrs Pavlovs, Kašers un Alina Keller parādīs, kā ar nelieliem stila knifiņiem divu stundu laikā uzmirdzēt jaunā tēlā un izskatīties daudz labāk. "Stila patruļa" aizturēs stila pārkāpējus, lai pārsteigtu ar patīkamu sodu - žilbinošām pārvērtībām.

programme.title: Stila patruļa

programme.title: Baigais numurs
programme.desc: Ilze Buna-Lediņa piedāvā viegli saprotamu pieeju numeroloģijai, skaidrojot, ka katram cilvēkam ir savs unikālais "Baigais numurs" - tas noslēpumainais X faktors, kas ietekmē mūsu izvēles un rīcību. Bet vai šo numuru var tiešām izskaidrot ar numeroloģiju? Vai tas tiešām var palīdzēt mums saprast, kāpēc mēs pieņemam noteiktas izvēles un kā tas atspoguļojas mūsu dzīvē?

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Viņa aizraušanās - noziegumu risināšana. Viņa lielākais talants - tikt ierautam sarežģītās mistērijās, lai kopā ar kapteini Heistingsu un Skotlendjarda galveno inspektoru Japu saliktu notikumus kopā kā puzles gabaliņus, ieraudzītu kopbildi un noskaidrotu vainīgo! Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Imma Tataranni. Likums papēžos
programme.desc: Prokurora vietniece Imma Tatarani strādā Materas pilsētā Itālijas dienvidos. Viņa apveltīta ar asu prātu un slavena ar savu stingro nostāju. Viņas tiešums, spītība un neparastais darba stils nereti kolēģiem nav pa prātam un liek justies neērti, taču tieši šīs īpašības padara viņu par vienu no efektīvākajām izmeklētājām. Katrs izmeklēšanas gadījums atklāj ne tikai noziegumu, bet arī dziļākas sabiedrības problēmas un personīgo drāmu. Paralēli profesionālajiem izaicinājumiem Imma cenšas tikt galā savu sarežģīto ģimenes dzīvi - attiecības ar vīru, pusaudzi meitu un pašas iekšējo pasauli. Galvenajās lomās: Vanesa Skalera, Masimiliano Gallo, Barbara Ronči

programme.title: Imma Tataranni. Likums papēžos
programme.desc: Prokurora vietniece Imma Tatarani strādā Materas pilsētā Itālijas dienvidos. Viņa apveltīta ar asu prātu un slavena ar savu stingro nostāju. Viņas tiešums, spītība un neparastais darba stils nereti kolēģiem nav pa prātam un liek justies neērti, taču tieši šīs īpašības padara viņu par vienu no efektīvākajām izmeklētājām. Galvenajās lomās: Vanesa Skalera, Masimiliano Gallo, Barbara Ronči

programme.title: ALL the OLD KNIVES
programme.desc: CIP aģents Henrijs no sava vadītāja Vika saņēmis uzdevumu slēgt kādu astoņus gadus senu nolaupīšanas lietu, kas beigusies ar traģēdiju. Vikam radušās aizdomas, ka toreiz CIP rindās bijis kāds nodevējs, kurš vainīgajiem nopludinājis informāciju un traucējis glābšanas operācijai. Lai noskaidrotu patiesību, Henrijs ir spiests sazināties ar savu bijušo kolēģi un mīļāko Sīliju, kura tiek turēta aizdomās, jo nākamajā dienā pēc traģēdijas pameta CIP rindas. Izmantojot vairākas perspektīvas, laika grafikus un intervijas, Henrijs, Viks un Sīlija mēģina atšķetināt pagātnes notikumus. Galvenajās lomās: Lorenss Fišbērns, Kriss Pains, Tandive Ņūtone

programme.title: Herca un Holija
programme.desc: Dakteres Katrīnas Hercas darba diena ir stresa pilna - mazpilsētā darba ir pārpilnām, pacienti stājas rindā, un viņas vīrs Bernds uzskata, ka tā tālāk nevar turpināts. Tāpēc Katrīna ar atplestām rokām un atvērtām durvīm sagaida jauno dakteri Holiju Sasu no Berlīnes. Holija nav paspējusi pat pieslēgt divriteni, kad jāparaksta jau līgums un jāķeras pie darba. Tomēr divu tik dažādo sieviešu sastrādāšanās nebūs nemaz tik vienkārša. Galvenajās lomās: Inka Frīdriha, Karolina Teska, Makss Volkijs

programme.title: Herca un Holija
programme.desc: Dakteres Katrīnu Hercu un Holiju Sasu mulsina kādas jaunās māmiņas neparasti simptomi. Katrīnas ilggadējas pacientes Irēnas meita Dana piedzīvo ekstrēmas garastāvokļa svārstības un atmiņas traucējumus. Kad tiek sasniegta kritiskā robeža, un Dana pastaigas laikā pazaudē bērnu, Holija saprot, ka lieta ir nopietna. Kamēr Katrīna tic, ka iemesls varētu būt tas, ka Dana senāk lietojusi narkotiskas vielas, Holija uzskata, ka jāmeklē citā virzienā. Kura daktere būs uz pareizā ceļa? Galvenajās lomās: Inka Frīdriha, Karolina Teska, Max Volkijs

programme.title: Gudrā blondīne
programme.desc: Pabeigusi Hārvardas universitāti, optimistiskā Ella Vudsa atgriežas jaunas un daudzsološas advokātes ampluā. Viņai ir darba pilnas rokas, turklāt vēl jāgatavojas ilgi gaidītajām kāzām. Tam visam pa vidu Ellai ienāk prātā sameklēt sava suņuka Bruisera vecākus. Ar šausmām viņa atklāj, ka mīļotā suņa ģimenes locekļi tiek izmantoti kosmētikas līdzekļu testiem. Sašutusi par šādu netaisnību, Ella dodas uz Vašingtonu, lai cīnītos par dzīvnieku tiesībām. Tas, protams, nenāksies viegli. Vai arī šoreiz rozā tērptā Ella izcīnīs savu taisnību? Galvenajās lomas Rīza Viterspūna, Regīna Kinga, Sallija Fīlda.

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Patiesi stāsti seriālā "Playboy noslēpumi"
programme.desc: Dokumentāls seriāls, kas atklāj glamūrīgās un spožās Hjū Hefnera "Playboy" impērijas tumšo pusi. Hjū Hefners bija veiksmīgs uzņēmējs, atbalstīja vārda brīvību, sieviešu tiesības un ar savu žurnālu mēģināja radīt seksuālu revolūciju, kas sievietes un vīriešus padarītu vienlīdzīgākus. Viņa greznajā savrupnamā dzīvoja modeles, Hjū Hefnera draudzenes, tika rīkotas grandiozas ballītes, kuras apmeklēja ietekmīgi un slaveni viesi, un daudzi par Hefneru izsakās ar apbrīnu. Dokumentālais seriāls atklāj daudz jauna un nepatīkama par "Playboy" aizkulisēm un pašu odiozo Hefneru. Atmiņās dalās bijušās modeles, Hjū Hefnera draugi un laika biedri.

programme.title: Patiesi stāsti seriālā "Playboy noslēpumi"
programme.desc: Dokumentāls seriāls, kas atklāj glamūrīgās un spožās Hjū Hefnera "Playboy" impērijas tumšo pusi. programme.title: Bezvēsts pazudušās
programme.desc: Uzzinājies patiesību par Viktorijas Markinas pazušanu, Konstantīns nolemj pamest Mēronu. Henrijam izdodas pierunāt izmeklētāju palikt. Konstantīnam rodas plāns, kā pamudināt makšķernieku Ivaru atklāt viņam patiesību par kādu senu Mēronas muižas notikumu, par kuru klīst baisas baumas. Mēronas viesnīcas atklāšanas dienā starp Valdi un Agnesi izceļas pamatīgs strīds. Bet Valdis pat nenojauš, ka šis vakars pārvērtīsies par šausmīgāko notikumu viņa dzīvē. Konstantīnam un Henrijam beidzot izdodas iekļūt Aināra Markina slepenajā istabā.

programme.title: Zem klāja Vidusjūrā
programme.desc: Luksus jahta atkal paceļ enkuru, lai vestu smalkus ļaudis kruīzā pa Vidusjūru - šoreiz Maltā. Kamēr viesi bauda jūru un sauli, ķer vasaras vēju matos, izklaidējas un līksmo, jahtas komanda dara visu, lai nodrošinātu viesiem augstākās klases servisu. Saspringtas situācijas, sarežģīti lēmumi, smags darbs - pēc stresa pilnām darba dienām prasās atbilstoša atpūta. Dzīve noslēgtā komūnā, ballītes un alkohols dara savu - darbinieku starpā ātri vien veidojas attiecības - gan draudzīgas, gan naidīgas, gan kaislīgi romantiskas. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.title: Zem klāja Vidusjūrā
programme.desc: Luksus jahta atkal paceļ enkuru, lai vestu smalkus ļaudis kruīzā pa Vidusjūru - šoreiz Maltā. Seko attiecību vētrām uz klāja un zem tā!

programme.title: Stila patruļa
programme.desc: Katrs vēlas izskatīties satriecoši, taču ne vienmēr tas izdodas. Tam ir virkne iemeslu - nav laika vai vēlmes, nav stila izjūtas, nav īstā diena vai līdzekļu. Tomēr ir stila "zelta likumi," kuri jāievēro un kuru pārkāpšanai nav attaisnojuma - nekopti nagi un mati, saplēsts vai netīrs, neizgludināts, auguma aprisēm nepiemērots apģērbs, pārspīlēti aksesuāri vai tādi, kuri savu laiku jau sen kā nokalpojuši, sievišķīguma slāpēšana zem mūžīgajām biksēm vai nevīžība apģērba izvēlē. Šos pārkāpumus nedrīkst pieļaut pat, lai tikai iznestu atkritumus vai aizskrietu līdz tuvējam veikalam. Tāpēc Latvijas vadošie stilisti Žanna Dubska, Aleksandrs Pavlovs, Kašers un Alina Keller parādīs, kā ar nelieliem stila knifiņiem divu stundu laikā uzmirdzēt jaunā tēlā un izskatīties daudz labāk. "Stila patruļa" aizturēs stila pārkāpējus, lai pārsteigtu ar patīkamu sodu - žilbinošām pārvērtībām.

programme.title: Stila patruļa

programme.title: Divi vienā
programme.desc: Attiecību šovs, kurā skaidrosim, kā tas ir - būt atšķirīgiem cilvēkiem, katram ar savu raksturu, sapņiem, vēlmēm un paradumiem, taču dzīvot vienās attiecībās, veidot vienu ģimeni. Šova vadītāja Kristīne Virsnīte uz sarunu aicinās pārus, kas atklās savu attiecību noslēpumus, savu attiecību pieredzi - kā cauri notikumiem, izaicinājumiem, priekiem un bēdām ir izdevies kopīgi augt un stiprināt attiecības.

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Viņa aizraušanās - noziegumu risināšana. Viņa lielākais talants - tikt ierautam sarežģītās mistērijās, lai kopā ar kapteini Heistingsu un Skotlendjarda galveno inspektoru Japu saliktu notikumus kopā kā puzles gabaliņus, ieraudzītu kopbildi un noskaidrotu vainīgo! Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Meitene šķūnī
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstīts meitenes nolaupīšanas stāsts. Ebijai Ernandezai tuvojās piecpadsmitā dzimšanas diena, kad viņa ceļā no skolas iekāpa mašīnā pie svešinieka, kurš solīja meiteni aizvest uz mājām. Tā bija liktenīga kļūda - Nataniels Kibijs nolaupīja Ebiju, turēja viņu gūstā un seksuāli izmantoja deviņus mēnešus. Visu šo laiku Ebija rūpīgi plānoja, kā iegūt noziedznieka uzticību, lai izdzīvotu un atgrieztos mājās. Kad policija nespēja Ebiju atrast, viņas māte Zenja nekad neatmeta cerību un turpināja meitas meklēšanu uz savu roku, līdz Ebijai izdevās atgriezties mājās. Galvenajās lomās: Lindsija Navaro, Ērika Duranse, Bens Sevidžs

programme.title: Līgavu kari
programme.desc: Kāzas ir viens no skaistākajiem un maģiskākajiem brīžiem ikvienas sievietes dzīvē. Arī labākās draudzenes Līva un Emma jau kopš bērnības ir sapņojušas par greznām kāzām vienā no Ņujorkas prestižākajām viesnīcām. Gluži kā uz burvju mājiena abas gandrīz vienlaicīgi tiek bildinātas un sāk plānot kāzas. Viss šķiet perfekti – līdz brīdim, kad nelāgas sakritības dēļ abas kāzas iekrīt vienā datumā. Ne Līva, ne Emma nevēlas mainīt ieplānoto kāzu laiku, tāpēc vienā mirklī dāmas no labākajām draudzenēm kļūst par kvēlākajām ienaidniecēm.

programme.title: Man patīk nepatikšanas
programme.desc: Romantiskā komēdija ar Džūliju Robertsu un Niku Nolti. Bijušais žurnālists Pīters izbauda slavas mirkļus pēc savas grāmatas publicēšanas. Kad viņa laikraksts "The Chicago Chronicle" lūdz uzrakstīt par vilciena avāriju, Pītera pašapmierinātību iedragā jaunās reportieres Sabīnes Pētersones raksts konkurentu laikrakstā "Chicago Globe". Seko neprātīga sacīkste starp abiem reportieriem, kuri cenšas izdomāt pēc iespējas krāšņākus notikumus, kas noveda pie avārijas. Pēc sākotnējā haosa abi apņemas sadarboties, lai noskaidrotu patiesību.

programme.title: Merilinas Monro slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Leģendārās kinodīvas Merilinas Monro īsā, bet spožā dzīve aprakstīta gan biogrāfiskās grāmatās gan atspoguļota dokumentālās filmās. Viņa palikusi atmiņā ar spilgtām kinolomām un žilbinošu ārieni, tāpat arī ar savu daudz aprunāto pieķeršanos pezidentam Kenedijam un trim laulībām, taču patiesībā Merilinas dzīve bijusi daudz sarežģītāka. To, ko redzēja publika, var saukt par aisberga redzamo daļu. Merilinai Monro bija noslēpumi, kurus viņa sargāja no visas pasaules - garīgi slima māte, kura, pretēji uzskatam, ka ir mirusi, vēl ilgi dzīvoja psihiatrisajā klīnikā, kā arī pārmantotā garīgā slimība no mātes. Tas viss tiek atklāts šajā divdaļīgajā stāstā par Holivudas dīvas Merilinas Monro patieso dzīvi.

programme.title: VECGADA KONCERTS. Olga un vīrieši
programme.desc: Svētku koncertā Olga Rajecka uzstājas kopā ar saviem skatuves draugiem, kolēģiem un ilggadīgiem kaimiņiem. Kopā ar dziedātāju uz skatuves kāps Nauris Puntulis, neiztrūkstošais Žoržs Siksna, ar kuru kopā Olga Rajecka savulaik piedalījusies mūziklā "Vella kalpi", Olgas Rajeckas kaimiņš un bijušais Filharmonijas kolēģis Imants Vanzovičs, Aigars Grāvers, neiztrūkstošais Varis Vētra un arī grupa "Baritoni". Par pavadījumu šajā koncertā gādās mūziķu grupa: Jānis Miltiņš, Jānis Rubiks, Jānis Riekstiņš, Tomass Ančs un Ernests Mediņš

programme.title: Šahs briljantu karalienei
programme.desc: Kādā dzīvoklī atrasts sievietes līķis, aizdomas par slepkavību krīt uz jaunu meiteni Zentu. Viņas advokāts Robežnieks, pārsniedzot savas pilnvaras, cenšas pats atrast vainīgo, tā apgrūtinot darbu izmeklētājiem Sokolovskim un Dolmanei. Galu galā Sokolovska pūliņu rezultātā tiek atmaskota "briljantu karaliene" un viņas līdzzinātāji, bet starp abiem izmeklētājiem uzplaukst savstarpējas simpātijas...

programme.title: Agata Kristi. Erkils Puaro
programme.desc: Viens no pasaules slavenākajiem detektīviem - Agatas Kristi romānu galvenais tēls Erkils Puaro! Vērīgs, uzmanīgs, inteliģents un vienmēr kārtīgi saposies. Galvenajās lomās: Deivids Sušē, Hjū Freizers, Filips Džeksons

programme.title: Patiesi stāsti seriālā "Playboy noslēpumi"
programme.desc: Dokumentāls seriāls, kas atklāj glamūrīgās un spožās Hjū Hefnera "Playboy" impērijas tumšo pusi. Hjū Hefners bija veiksmīgs uzņēmējs, atbalstīja vārda brīvību, sieviešu tiesības un ar savu žurnālu mēģināja radīt seksuālu revolūciju, kas sievietes un vīriešus padarītu vienlīdzīgākus. Viņa greznajā savrupnamā dzīvoja modeles, Hjū Hefnera draudzenes, tika rīkotas grandiozas ballītes, kuras apmeklēja ietekmīgi un slaveni viesi, un daudzi par Hefneru izsakās ar apbrīnu. Dokumentālais seriāls atklāj daudz jauna un nepatīkama par "Playboy" aizkulisēm un pašu odiozo Hefneru. Atmiņās dalās bijušās modeles, Hjū Hefnera draugi un laika biedri.

programme.title: Что? Где? Когда?
programme.desc: По правилам, в игре принимают участие команды из шести человек, которые отвечают на вопросы телезрителей. Правильный ответ, который знатоки должны найти в течение минуты, приносит им балл. В случае неверного ответа, очко отходит команде телезрителей. В кресла знатоков в юбилейном сезоне традиционно сядут, как опытные игроки, так и новички, среди которых артисты, спортсмены, юмористы, юристы и ведущие.

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff
programme.desc: Two of Americas most prominent baking connoisseurs whisk, beat and whip against each other to become the champion of cake. Buddy Valastro, the Italian star of Cake Boss and Duff Goldman, the professional pastry star of Ace of Cakes, compete in a baking battle like no other, using their experience, knowledge and culinary skill-set to produce magnificent cakes. Whether its a masterpiece fit for a wedding, a birthday cake fit for a celebrity, donuts to please eager customers at a Los Angeles drive-thru or sweet treats to satisfy amusement park thrill-seekers, the competitive chefs pull out all the stops to win each challenge.

programme.title: Buddys Big Bakedown
programme.desc: American bakery competition presented by Bartolo "Buddy" Valastro Jr AKA The Cake Boss. Buddy invites pairs of baking-mad friends and family members to go up against each other in the kitchen. The couples are challenged to create, bake and decorate cakes of all different tastes, shapes and sizes – but which team will walk away with the cash prize and the title of Bakedown Champions?

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Definitely not created for the squeamish, Dr Pimple Popper features dermatologist and Internet celebrity Dr. Sandra Lee as she treats patients suffering with unique skin conditions such as facial and skin disorders. Including the extraction of blackheads, cysts and uncovering new skin conditions that audiences may not have known of before, Dr. Sandra Lee started uploading content onto Youtube and Instagram, gaining a lot of popularity by people enjoying spots and cysts being popped. Those included within her videos gave written permission for her to record and post the content in exchange for discounted or free-treatments. Dr. Pimple Popper is on a mission to reclaim the lives of those suffering with these unusual and rare skin condition and remove their embarrassment.

programme.title: Body Bizarre
programme.desc: Body Bizarre is a documentary series presenting stories of people from all over the world who are suffering from unusual and mysterious disease states. Some of people need surgery that is so risky that the chances of survival are small. Some of the conditions are so rare and unstudied, that the best doctors are just puzzled and cant do anything to help. Discover the real stories of individuals living with the most incredible medical anomalies.

programme.title: Welcome To Plathville
programme.desc: Welcome To Plathville is an American reality series following husband and wife Kim and Barry Plath, and their nine children; Ethan, Hosanna, Micah, Moriah, Lydia, Isaac, Amber, Cassia, and Mercy. Apart from Ethan and Hosanna, who live with their respective spouses, the family reside on a rural farm in Georgia, where the children must abide by Kim and Barrys conservative rules. No sugar, no television, no non-religious music and no video games, the children must follow their parents strict guidelines, as family life centres around music and God. We follow the family through their daily routines, revealing all the drama that ensues with having so many children.

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff

Buddy Valastro, the Italian star of Cake Boss and Duff Goldman, the professional pastry star of Ace of Cakes, compete in a baking battle like no other, using their experience, knowledge and culinary skill-set to produce magnificent cakes. We follow the family through their daily routines, revealing all the drama that ensues with having so many children.

programme.title: Return To Amish
programme.desc: American reality television series, a spin-off and continuation series to Breaking Amish, that features original cast members- Abe and Rebecca Schmucker, Jeremiah Raber, and Sabrina High, who return to Pennsylvania and try to adjust to living in their Amish communities once again, facing new struggles as they come to terms with the fact that life doesnt get any easier after leaving communities behind. We also get to meet some new and interesting people, friends and family members of the original cast and follow the life of Kate Stoltz who decided to stay in New York and pursue her modeling career.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress America
programme.desc: Looking for your perfect dress? Kleinfeld Bridal is the place for you. Follow brides as they head off on their search for the perfect wedding dress, no matter how big or small in the city of New York. Bringing their friends and family along to help them decide, will they girls trip to the store be an easy one? The brides are each assisted by a consultant during a private shopping event, the outcome being that all important dress.

programme.title: Kitchen Boss
programme.desc: Hosted by Buddy Valastro, this cooking program takes various Italian-American dishes from Valastros own family recipes and shows how they can be prepared in minimal time and using ingredients that are easily obtainable and affordable. Each meal usually consists of a main course, a side dish and a dessert and Buddy is joined in the kitchen by members of his family to show us how its done and to add authenticity. Episodes feature Buddy and his wife Lisa making chicken Sorrentino with fusilli with a side of asparagus and chocolate dipped strawberries for dessert for date night; Auntie Anna revealing her secret recipes for manicotti and her chicken with vinegar peppers; or Buddy and his cousin Frankie reminiscing about the sights and food of Italian street fairs. The recipe for each dish can be found on the shows website.

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress: Lancashire
programme.desc: Its the dress that all little girls dream of, and one that most will only get chance to pick out once. A fairy tale occasion that has the ability to make dreams come true. Its also the source of tantrums, tears and arguments all wrapped up in tulle and satin with an intricate beading. A brides journey to picking out that perfect wedding gown is a near military operation. Luckily, Gok Wan has joined the expert bridal consultants at Ava Rose Hamiltons Boutique in Lancashire to help an abundance of brides-to-be track down their dream dress. But, with budgets to consider, personal issues, dramas and the opinions of the entourage, will Gok be able to help these brides find their perfect gown?

programme.title: Say Yes To the Dress: Lancashire

programme.title: Trapped: What Is Happening To Wendy Williams
Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: Happily Ever After?
programme.desc: American reality series, a follow-up spinoff of 90 Day Fiance that features couples who have applied for or received a K-1 visa (available uniquely to foreign fiances of U.S. citizens) and have ninety days to marry each other, follows some of the most famous and interesting couples from the original show and documents the ups and downs of their relationships after they got married. For some of these couples, the real drama is just starting because they barely know each other and they have to battle critics, doubters, and various obstacles on their road to love. Some of the couples that are featured on the show are Danielle and Mohamed, Melanie and Devar, Loren and Alexei, Kyle and Noon, Brett and Daya and Russ and Paola.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: Happily Ever After?
programme.desc: American reality series, a follow-up spinoff of 90 Day Fiance that features couples who have applied for or received a K-1 visa (available uniquely to foreign fiances of U.S. citizens) and have ninety days to marry each other, follows some of the most famous and interesting couples from the original show and documents the ups and downs of their relationships after they got married. programme.title: I Love a Mamas Boy
programme.desc: What happens when a woman falls in love with a guy and wants to marry him… but he has a FAR more important woman in his life? Its his MOM! In this unbelievable new TLC series, the only thing standing between a couples true love is a very different kind of "other woman." These guys are spoiled, coddled and spoon-fed - in some cases quite literally - by their overbearing mothers, sending their relationships into serious romantic crisis. Follow four young women as they compete for the affection of their significant others with some VERY significant mothers!

programme.title: Nate and Jeremiah by Design
programme.desc: Interior designer Nate Berkus is joined by his husband, fellow designer Jeremiah Brent, as hosts of this home renovation show. Both designers use their undisputed skills to help out homeowners who are stuck in the middle of horrendous home improvement nightmares and who are facing financial ruin because of it. Their aim is to turn the homeowners money pit into a major asset. Each hour-long episode features a different renovation problem and the two designers use unique design pieces and their own personal touch to add character and value to each project. The series also invites the viewer into the couples private life to show they cope with raising their daughter, Poppy, "the girl that changed everything.".

programme.title: Welcome To Plathville
programme.desc: Welcome To Plathville is an American reality series following husband and wife Kim and Barry Plath, and their nine children; Ethan, Hosanna, Micah, Moriah, Lydia, Isaac, Amber, Cassia, and Mercy. Apart from Ethan and Hosanna, who live with their respective spouses, the family reside on a rural farm in Georgia, where the children must abide by Kim and Barrys conservative rules. No sugar, no television, no non-religious music and no video games, the children must follow their parents strict guidelines, as family life centres around music and God. We follow the family through their daily routines, revealing all the drama that ensues with having so many children.

programme.title: Match Me Abroad
programme.desc: Victorias date leads to a surprising discovery. Amber ends up in a prison with her match. Torn between two suitors, Monica chooses her next date.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance
programme.desc: Buckle up, TLC and 90 Day Fiance fans! Hot off their upcoming appearance on 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER?, fan-favorites Pedro and Chantel and their lively in-laws will be the focal point of a spinoff series from the 90 DAY FIANCÉ franchise called THE FAMILY CHANTEL, premiering Monday nights this July. Ever since Chantel first introduced Pedro to her family under the false pretense of him coming to America on a student visa, the drama that followed has kept fans obsessed. From their beginnings on 90 DAY FIANCÉ season four through 90 DAY FIANCÉ: HAPPILY EVER AFTER, Pedro and Chantel have weathered major marital ups and downs involving everything from feisty family members to their own trust issues. Viewers will follow this unique modern family as they try to move past their differences and come together as an extended family, but as Chantels parents Karen and Thomas try to protect their brood, will they push their children too far? The family members featured in the upcoming series include Chantels parents Karen and Thomas and siblings River and Winter, as well as Pedros mother Lidia and sister Nicole.

Those included within her videos gave written permission for her to record and post the content in exchange for discounted or free-treatments. Dr. Pimple Popper is on a mission to reclaim the lives of those suffering with these unusual and rare skin condition and remove their embarrassment.

programme.title: Body Bizarre
programme.desc: Body Bizarre is a documentary series presenting stories of people from all over the world who are suffering from unusual and mysterious disease states. Some of people need surgery that is so risky that the chances of survival are small. Some of the conditions are so rare and unstudied, that the best doctors are just puzzled and cant do anything to help. Discover the real stories of individuals living with the most incredible medical anomalies.

programme.title: Nate and Jeremiah by Design
programme.desc: Interior designer Nate Berkus is joined by his husband, fellow designer Jeremiah Brent, as hosts of this home renovation show. Both designers use their undisputed skills to help out homeowners who are stuck in the middle of horrendous home improvement nightmares and who are facing financial ruin because of it. Their aim is to turn the homeowners money pit into a major asset. Each hour-long episode features a different renovation problem and the two designers use unique design pieces and their own personal touch to add character and value to each project. The series also invites the viewer into the couples private life to show they cope with raising their daughter, Poppy, "the girl that changed everything.".

programme.title: Virgins
programme.desc: Deannes date backfires when she only has eyes for the waiter. A potential date gets touchy-feely with Alex at tantra speed dating.

programme.title: I Love a Mamas Boy
programme.desc: What happens when a woman falls in love with a guy and wants to marry him… but he has a FAR more important woman in his life? Its his MOM! In this unbelievable new TLC series, the only thing standing between a couples true love is a very different kind of "other woman." These guys are spoiled, coddled and spoon-fed - in some cases quite literally - by their overbearing mothers, sending their relationships into serious romantic crisis. Follow four young women as they compete for the affection of their significant others with some VERY significant mothers!

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: Happily Ever After?
programme.desc: American reality series, a follow-up spinoff of 90 Day Fiance that features couples who have applied for or received a K-1 visa (available uniquely to foreign fiances of U.S. citizens) and have ninety days to marry each other, follows some of the most famous and interesting couples from the original show and documents the ups and downs of their relationships after they got married. For some of these couples, the real drama is just starting because they barely know each other and they have to battle critics, doubters, and various obstacles on their road to love. Some of the couples that are featured on the show are Danielle and Mohamed, Melanie and Devar, Loren and Alexei, Kyle and Noon, Brett and Daya and Russ and Paola.

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff
programme.desc: Two of Americas most prominent baking connoisseurs whisk, beat and whip against each other to become the champion of cake. Buddy Valastro, the Italian star of Cake Boss and Duff Goldman, the professional pastry star of Ace of Cakes, compete in a baking battle like no other, using their experience, knowledge and culinary skill-set to produce magnificent cakes. Whether its a masterpiece fit for a wedding, a birthday cake fit for a celebrity, donuts to please eager customers at a Los Angeles drive-thru or sweet treats to satisfy amusement park thrill-seekers, the competitive chefs pull out all the stops to win each challenge.

programme.title: 90 Day: Hunt for Love
programme.desc: Tiffany hits it off at flirting 101 while Cortney struggles. Colt drops a bombshell crush. Robs eye is on someone new, ruffling feathers.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiance: What Now?
programme.desc: In this What Now? spin off of the American reality series 90 Day Fiancee, we revisit the lives of featured couples, checking in to see if theyre still together or if the foreign spouse has left the country. The original reality series explores marriages that have been arranged to obtain a K-1 visa, a certificate of residency uniquely available to foreign fiancees of US citizens. The visa gives the engaged couples 90 days to plan and have their respective ceremonies. These partners have never lived with each other, and these ninety days are the first real test of their relationship.

Whether its a masterpiece fit for a wedding, a birthday cake fit for a celebrity, donuts to please eager customers at a Los Angeles drive-thru or sweet treats to satisfy amusement park thrill-seekers, the competitive chefs pull out all the stops to win each challenge.

programme.title: Buddys Big Bakedown
programme.desc: American bakery competition presented by Bartolo "Buddy" Valastro Jr AKA The Cake Boss. Buddy invites pairs of baking-mad friends and family members to go up against each other in the kitchen. The couples are challenged to create, bake and decorate cakes of all different tastes, shapes and sizes – but which team will walk away with the cash prize and the title of Bakedown Champions?

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Documentary series surrounding Alaskas answer to its Bermuda namesake, and the mysteries that have dumbfounded experts over the years. From unsolved disappearances to purported paranormal activity, sightings of unknown creatures to claims of extraterrestrial activity, and undiscovered aircraft crashes to unknown lights in the sky, each of the mysteries are as bizarre and baffling as the next. The series features testimonies from witnesses as well as footage that claims to back up proposed theories, certifying The Alaska Triangle as one of the most mysterious places on Earth.

programme.title: Ghost Asylum
programme.desc: Featuring a fearless crew on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions in anyway they can, Ghost Asylum follows a passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC) as they attempt to "trap ghosts" in the countrys most haunted abandoned asylums, mental hospitals and sanitariums. Using their Sourthern charm and engineering knowledge to create supernatural inventions during their hunting to find ghosts or spirits of any kind. Their speciality is investigating the decaying, haunting and skin crawling mental institutions throughout the USA, warning viewers that they have permission to enter the most haunted buildings and that chasing ghosts without proper training "will get you killed", so dont try this at home.

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror
programme.desc: Convinced that Karen is experiencing a spirit attachment, the team decide to move the family off the ranch. Then, Tim and Scott confront the dark haunting alone.

programme.title: Portals To Hell
programme.desc: Growing up around Ozzy Osbourne must have been, at times, a frightening ordeal for Jack Osbourne, however that hasnt stopped the son of the Prince of Darkness teaming up with paranormal investigator Katrina Weidman, to explore infamous, haunted locations. In each episode of this frightening reality series, Jack and Katrina head to a new place with a chilling history, and each sinister site is said to be a portal to the depths of the underworld. With the help of a team of experts and armed with unique technology, the pair thoroughly examine each new haunting site, hoping to unearth the truth behind their respective mysterious pasts.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Hotel
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates the secrets and legends hidden in the rooms of many hotels, motels and resorts in America. With two million hotel rooms occupied every night in America, its no wonder that some of the most captivating tales have occurred in hotels. Each episode includes dramatic recreations featuring actors re-telling the most mysterious, outrageous and strange stories and legends from Americas history that have occurred either inside the rooms, or near famous and even not-so-famous hotels.

programme.title: These Woods Are Haunted
programme.desc: The great outdoors is full of mystery and beauty, but nobody expects to run into paranormal entities or monstrous creatures during a normal day out. This documentary series examines terrifying tales where individuals have found themselves coming into contact with unexplained phenomena. What was supposed to be a pleasant trip soon turns into a nightmare, and with dramatic reconstructions, their frightening ordeals are brought to life. Each episode explores a respective story, featuring interviews with the individuals involved alongside the re-enactments.

programme.title: Ghost Asylum
programme.desc: Featuring a fearless crew on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions in anyway they can, Ghost Asylum follows a passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC) as they attempt to "trap ghosts" in the countrys most haunted abandoned asylums, mental hospitals and sanitariums. Using their Sourthern charm and engineering knowledge to create supernatural inventions during their hunting to find ghosts or spirits of any kind. Their speciality is investigating the decaying, haunting and skin crawling mental institutions throughout the USA, warning viewers that they have permission to enter the most haunted buildings and that chasing ghosts without proper training "will get you killed", so dont try this at home.

programme.title: Ghost Lab
programme.desc: Ghost Lab is an American paranormal TV series revolving around ghost-hunting brothers Brad and Barry Klinge, the founders of Everyday Paranormal- a paranormal investigation team. Their mission is to visit the most haunted places in America in order to study and investigate the afterlife and its questionable existence. The team use various equipment during their investigations, such as thermographic cameras, infrared cameras, digital audio recorders, data loggers, motion detectors, and other high tech gear.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Museum
programme.desc: Documentary series in which host Don Wildman, history enthusiast and adventurer, focuses on interesting and unusual artifacts held in museums, historical institutions, and unexplored archives around the world. Don discovers extraordinary, obscure relics and artifacts, shares their incredible stories, that have either been forgotten or are lesser known, and reveals their secrets, taking the viewers on a spectacular tour through history. We also get to find out why and how some of these unusual objects ended up in the museums.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: The team heads to southern Alaska to investigate sightings of a highly temperamental Bigfoot. Todd and Rhett build a huge, electrified tepee to catch it.

programme.title: It Feels Evil
programme.desc: Join expert demon hunter Tim Wood, and his team, as they travel across Texas, investigating some of its most mysterious hauntings. Armed with cutting-edge scientific techniques and years of experience, Tim and the crew set out to confront and communicate with evil spirits. Risking their own souls in order to capture the malevolent entities, things take a dark turn when Tim himself becomes ensnared by the demon Zozo and has to be rescued.

programme.title: Kindred Spirits
programme.desc: Thrilling American paranormal docu-reality series that follows investigators Amy Bruni and Adam Berry who visit various haunted homes across the country in order to help people who are tormented by the spirits of their late relatives. These families are scared by the mysterious occurences and they will seek help from this amazing ghost-hunting duo. Amy and Adam will try to find evidence of paranormal presence, contact the spirits and provide closure for the featured family.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: American archaeologist, author and explorer Josh Gates explores the world to solve longstanding mysteries and legends that are yet to be solved. With no story too big, Josh travels across the globe to identify clues and secrets that could help him find the truth. First he must gather as much information about the case, before jetting off to pursue his leads. Whether its uncovering long lost Nazi treasures, unearthing the birth place of Jesus, deciphering the origin of Stonehenge or investigating the Vikings rise to power, Josh leaves no stone unturned in his quest for answers.

programme.title: Building Alaska
programme.desc: Building Alaska is a reality and documentary TV series following a cast of characters who set out to construct three incredible cabins in the obscure Alaskan wilderness. There are no roads and no building supply centers around, and they have to deal with extreme weather conditions, not to mention curious animals. From the foundation to doors and windows, finishing with interior work and electrical system, everything should be done, so hours and hours of hard work are ahead of the participants.

programme.title: Edge of Alaska
programme.desc: McCarthy, Alaska is home to a rugged bunch of mavericks and risk takers, willing to brave the brutal conditions in this icy, isolated town. Once a thriving, prosperous place due to the gold rush, the town is now home to a mere 40 people. There is a juxtaposition between residents; while some believe in a traditional way of life, others are desperate to drag McCarthy into the modern age, believing this is the only way to ensure its survival. Edge of Alaska tells the story of this community at a crossroads.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods with Andrew Zimmern
programme.desc: Explore remote regions of the world as you join host Andrew Zimmern on his search for Bizarre regional cuisine. Tasting and eating food that is typically perceived as disgusting, bizarre and sometimes even exotic. Each episode focuses on different countries and their regions, exploring meals that even the locals wouldnt eat. While demonstrating and discovering how the food is prepared, procured and served. Watch Andrew as he eats bugs, worms and all kinds of creepy crawlies that most people wouldnt touch with a ten-foot pole.

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: This paranormal reality series follows explorer and ghost hunter Dakota Laden who partners up his sister Chelsea and best friend Tanner, to travel across the country in an RV and visit the most haunted locations in America -dark corridors of Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary, notorious Eloise Psychiatric Hospital, terrifying St. Albans Sanatorium and many more, as they learn the blood-chilling stories behind this scary places and face their darkest fears.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters
programme.desc: Mountain Monsters is an American cryptozoology-themed reality TV series revolving around the Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings team. It is a group of six skilled native West Virginian hunters and trappers. They are on a mission to study and track unidentified creatures in the Appalachian Mountains. Their main goal is to prove that mysterious creatures like Bigfoot, Werewolf, Hellhound, Lizard Man, and Mothman do exist and provide the proper evidence to the viewers.

programme.title: The Osbournes Want To Believe
programme.desc: The Osbourne family return in another reality series, this time fronted by Jack as he shows to Ozzy and Sharon some of the craziest, inexplicable videos of paranormal activity caught on camera. Although Ozzy may occasionally look like a frightening spectre, he is not the star of this series, as the videos demonstrate bizarre instances of supernatural events, with Jack testing his parents lack of beliefs when it comes to the unknown. These unexplained events have perplexed and baffled experts for years, but will Ozzy and Sharon become believers? Or will they dismiss the videos as explainable?

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror
programme.desc: Convinced that Karen is experiencing a spirit attachment, the team decide to move the family off the ranch. Then, Tim and Scott confront the dark haunting alone.

programme.title: Portals To Hell
programme.desc: Growing up around Ozzy Osbourne must have been, at times, a frightening ordeal for Jack Osbourne, however that hasnt stopped the son of the Prince of Darkness teaming up with paranormal investigator Katrina Weidman, to explore infamous, haunted locations. In each episode of this frightening reality series, Jack and Katrina head to a new place with a chilling history, and each sinister site is said to be a portal to the depths of the underworld. With the help of a team of experts and armed with unique technology, the pair thoroughly examine each new haunting site, hoping to unearth the truth behind their respective mysterious pasts.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Castle
programme.desc: Find out the breathtaking stories hidden behind the doors of the most famous, notorious and impressive castles and mansions in different parts of the world. Listen to their dark secrets and mysterious legends, and visit Frankenstein Castle in Darmstadt, Germany, the Tower of London in London, England, Castello di Malaspina in Fosdinovo, Italy, Edinburgh Castle in Edinburgh, Scotland, Bran Castle in Bran, Romania and other magic spots.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: This documentary crime show is about uncovering and seeking out the truth into the mystery of the most shocking disperse that have taken place over the years. The cold case that no one seem to be able to solve laving people to believe in the supernatural and family wondering why and how. Leaving the people left be hide baffled and to try to discovery what has happen. To do this they will use the science and technol of today to try to uncover what has taken place on these mystery day. Follow the presenter as he deep dive into to the world of the unknown.

programme.title: Finding Bigfoot
programme.desc: In North American folklore, upright walking, ape-like humanoid creatures roam the wilderness, dwelling just under the radar of humans. Now, four professional researchers and explorers are investigating the potential evidence of Bigfoot across the United States and Canada. Founder and president of Bigfoot Field Researchers Organisation, Matt Moneymaker, is joined by researchers James "Bobo" Fay, Cliff Barackman, and Ranae Holland on this epic inquiry into one of folklores biggest mysteries.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Documentary series. Using eye-witness accounts and new, incredible scientific evidence, In Search Of Monsters brings to life the haunting creatures that both fright and fascinate us. Narrated by Gabe Kunda, the series covers some of the most iconic and infamous monsters in folklore. From Bigfoots DNA to Nessies true whereabouts, In Search Of Monsters investigates astonishing new theories on these grisly giants.

programme.title: Treasure Quest: Snake Island
programme.desc: This reality show follows the exploits of an intrepid group of adventurers who set out to investigate a 16th century legend of lost treasure. The Treasure of the Trinity is said to be a cache of Incan gold worth hundreds of millions of dollars that is hidden off the coast of Brazil. Our team of explorers believe the treasure to be secreted away on a remote, dangerous island known to the locals as Snake Island. Using cutting-edge technology and their well-honed survival skills, the squad try to overcome the extreme risks posed by the islands population of deadly golden lancehead pit vipers, bullet ants, hazardous terrain and poachers. The clues they discover lead them to further exploits in Paraguay and Argentina.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle

The series features testimonies from witnesses as well as footage that claims to back up proposed theories, certifying The Alaska Triangle as one of the most mysterious places on Earth.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.desc: Great World Hotels takes you on a journey to the some of the worlds most luxurious hotels and resorts. We visit everything from your own personal lagoon island huts, the size of mansions, to the largest, most decadent penthouse in New York City. Live life like the stars as we explore every corner of the world from the comfort of your sofa. Season one alone takes us from Dubai to Mauritius to the Maldives. Whether youre an avid traveller or have never left the country, this journey is suitable for everyone. This is your journey. This is our journey.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer and Rohan
programme.desc: Traveler and explorer Rohan Patoley takes you to some of the most amazing hidden gems of Uttarakhand with a very special companion, his pet dog Healer. The two experience incredible adventures across Indias northern state, discovering its magnificent natural beauties, from beaches to rivers, hills and much more.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.desc: Bucket List is a travel program entirely dedicated to Japan, a wonderful country with unique culture and traditions, volcanoes, cuisine, lifestyle, and amazing people. Paddy Doherty and Daniel Coll are active in the British and Irish media, visit Japan and experience various things in each region, while encountering challenges that make them confront their own phobias and fears. The viewers who are not yet familiar with Japan will put it on their bucket list and eventually come to visit and see the one-of-a-kind localities themselves.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Get a new direction and visit unfamiliar fascinating destinations all over the globe. Wild life, magnificent nature, unique culture, delicious local food, nonchalant relaxation- a true recipe to unwind. Together with Unwind on Travelxp embrace fantastic views and luxury at its best, find excellent places to unwind. Enjoy new experience of the unknown places on your own terms. Watch magnificent palaces, diversities of culture, cruise down the canals and rivers, take a look at perfect glamorous holiday destinations and dont forget to allow yourself a bit of fun and relaxation.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.desc: Long work hours and stress definitely influence your mental and physical health. programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Documentary series. Join host Alexandra Outhwaite has she journeys through the wonderfully cultural country of Spain. The seventh most populous country in Europe, Spain is home to over 45 million people, and this series covers the countrys three biggest cities: Madrid, Barcelona and Valencia. Alexandra dives into the local way of life to find out what makes Spain such an attractive prospect for tourists. With its pristine beaches, exquisite cuisine, stunning landscapes and festive fiestas, Spain is certainly one Europes hottest destinations to explore.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: British television presenter and travel expert, Sabrina Chakici, explores the Mediterranean island of Cyprus to explore its attractions and traditions. These range from rich local cuisines loaded with culture ancient cities flooded with Greek myths, such as the city of Lazarus which has over ten thousand years of history. The city which served as Cyprus capital for the past 1100-years will also be explored. The vast Greek history within these places and masses of archaeological discoveries are explored as well as the pristine beaches that lay on the coastlines.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: City Breaks is a travel show that guides you through most astonishing cities of the world to show their rich history and culture and inspires you to explore everything a city has to offer on a city break, its cuisine, shopping spots, wonderful views, historical values. Paddy Doherty and Daniel Coll are active in the British and Irish media, visit Japan and experience various things in each region, while encountering challenges that make them confront their own phobias and fears. The viewers who are not yet familiar with Japan will put it on their bucket list and eventually come to visit and see the one-of-a-kind localities themselves.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: British television presenter and travel expert, Sabrina Chakici, explores the Mediterranean island of Cyprus to explore its attractions and traditions. These range from rich local cuisines loaded with culture ancient cities flooded with Greek myths, such as the city of Lazarus which has over ten thousand years of history. The city which served as Cyprus capital for the past 1100-years will also be explored. The vast Greek history within these places and masses of archaeological discoveries are explored as well as the pristine beaches that lay on the coastlines.

programme.title: Best from the Rest
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world even on a holiday we are always short of time and in a rush. Best From the Rest on TravelXP will filter the information to save you every single minute so that you wont miss a thing. The show highlights top five places or activities that deserve your full attention in various cities all over the world. From top 5 romantic places in Mauritius, 5 best things to do when in Dubai, to 5 must see destinations in Hong Kong, 5 most sacred temples in the state of Rajasthan and 5 new adventures in Jordan. Every signature episode will take your breath away.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Landmarks is a documentary series that celebrates wonderful sites from all around the world that have great cultural and historical significance. From natural beauties to monuments raised in remembrance of important historical figures, from architectural wonders to religious sites, these are some of the worlds most amazing landmarks. Discover the stories behind them and find out more about their importance, both in the past and in the present day, including sites like the Buckingham Palace, the Dead Sea and the Burj Khalifa skyscraper in Dubai.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.desc: Taking the visitor behind the scenes of well-known and popular tourist destinations, Food Fact Fun explores the cuisine and culture of cities the world over through a lively and adventurous look at the hidden side of culinary travel; shining some light on the facts and fun that can be learned and enjoyed while travelling in a culinary way through varied cultures and parts of the world.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer and Rohan
programme.desc: Traveler and explorer Rohan Patoley takes you to some of the most amazing hidden gems of Uttarakhand with a very special companion, his pet dog Healer. The two experience incredible adventures across Indias northern state, discovering its magnificent natural beauties, from beaches to rivers, hills and much more.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Documentary series. Join host Alexandra Outhwaite has she journeys through the wonderfully cultural country of Spain. The seventh most populous country in Europe, Spain is home to over 45 million people, and this series covers the countrys three biggest cities: Madrid, Barcelona and Valencia. Alexandra dives into the local way of life to find out what makes Spain such an attractive prospect for tourists. With its pristine beaches, exquisite cuisine, stunning landscapes and festive fiestas, Spain is certainly one Europes hottest destinations to explore.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Italians Erica Melargo and Marco Biagioli, as they take us on an irreverant journey through Estonia, exploring many of the countrys national parks and getting to know more about the local inhabitants, cuisine, natural beauty and culture. Each episode focuses on a different region or national park and provides a fairytale experience for our intrepid travellers. The seires includes visits to the unique attractions of the town of Aidu; the historic remains of the border town of Narva; the traditional ethnic area of the Seto people in Setomaa; and the marshy wetlands of Soomaa National Park.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Documentary series. Step into a world of Eastern European diversity as we explore the fascinating country of Bulgaria. Steeped in a rich culture that takes in Greek, Slavic, Ottoman, and Persian influences, Bulgaria is a country with a remarkable history. With its capital Sofia first established over 7000 years ago (making it the second oldest city in Europe) this series takes a look at how this history still plays a huge part in todays way of life. From its traditional music to vibrant dancing, Bulgaria has established itself as one of the most unique cultures in Europe.

programme.desc: In Chennai, where the streets buzz with sizzling plates and the fine-dining scene is on the rise, Charlie dives into the flavors of South India.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: Bliss on Travelxp shows you the best destinations across the globe. Take a wonderful trip to the beautiful beaches, enjoy vast landscapes, try amazing mouthwatering dishes. The host takes you around places to reveal their distinctive architecture, castles and gardens. Revel in a holiday of your dreams and discover the most luxurious hotels in Greece, Austria, India, Bulgaria, Turkey and much more.

programme.title: Best from the Rest
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world even on a holiday we are always short of time and in a rush. Best From the Rest on TravelXP will filter the information to save you every single minute so that you wont miss a thing. The show highlights top five places or activities that deserve your full attention in various cities all over the world. From top 5 romantic places in Mauritius, 5 best things to do when in Dubai, to 5 must see destinations in Hong Kong, 5 most sacred temples in the state of Rajasthan and 5 new adventures in Jordan. Every signature episode will take your breath away.

programme.title: Mr. and Mrs. Roy in AlUla
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi take a romantic trip to AlUla, where traditional Arab hospitality and the mysteries of an ancient kingdom beckon.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.desc: Great World Hotels takes you on a journey to the some of the worlds most luxurious hotels and resorts. We visit everything from your own personal lagoon island huts, the size of mansions, to the largest, most decadent penthouse in New York City. Live life like the stars as we explore every corner of the world from the comfort of your sofa. Season one alone takes us from Dubai to Mauritius to the Maldives. Whether youre an avid traveller or have never left the country, this journey is suitable for everyone. This is your journey. This is our journey.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Documentary series. Step into a world of Eastern European diversity as we explore the fascinating country of Bulgaria. Steeped in a rich culture that takes in Greek, Slavic, Ottoman, and Persian influences, Bulgaria is a country with a remarkable history. With its capital Sofia first established over 7000 years ago (making it the second oldest city in Europe) this series takes a look at how this history still plays a huge part in todays way of life. From its traditional music to vibrant dancing, Bulgaria has established itself as one of the most unique cultures in Europe.

programme.title: Travel Diaries Of Healer and Rohan
programme.desc: Traveler and explorer Rohan Patoley takes you to some of the most amazing hidden gems of Uttarakhand with a very special companion, his pet dog Healer. The two experience incredible adventures across Indias northern state, discovering its magnificent natural beauties, from beaches to rivers, hills and much more.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.desc: Bucket List is a travel program entirely dedicated to Japan, a wonderful country with unique culture and traditions, volcanoes, cuisine, lifestyle, and amazing people. Paddy Doherty and Daniel Coll are active in the British and Irish media, visit Japan and experience various things in each region, while encountering challenges that make them confront their own phobias and fears. The viewers who are not yet familiar with Japan will put it on their bucket list and eventually come to visit and see the one-of-a-kind localities themselves.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Italians Erica Melargo and Marco Biagioli, as they take us on an irreverant journey through Estonia, exploring many of the countrys national parks and getting to know more about the local inhabitants, cuisine, natural beauty and culture. Each episode focuses on a different region or national park and provides a fairytale experience for our intrepid travellers. The seires includes visits to the unique attractions of the town of Aidu; the historic remains of the border town of Narva; the traditional ethnic area of the Seto people in Setomaa; and the marshy wetlands of Soomaa National Park.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Get a new direction and visit unfamiliar fascinating destinations all over the globe. Wild life, magnificent nature, unique culture, delicious local food, nonchalant relaxation- a true recipe to unwind. Together with Unwind on Travelxp embrace fantastic views and luxury at its best, find excellent places to unwind. Enjoy new experience of the unknown places on your own terms. Watch magnificent palaces, diversities of culture, cruise down the canals and rivers, take a look at perfect glamorous holiday destinations and dont forget to allow yourself a bit of fun and relaxation.

programme.title: Taco To Tikka
programme.desc: Charlies journey through Lucknows kitchens takes him straight into the citys royal legacy.

programme.title: Роман с детективом
programme.desc: Школьница Сашка попадает в секту к лже-гуру Изюмову, который соблазняет девушку. Сашка ждёт от него ребёнка.

programme.title: Мистические истории
programme.desc: Каждая серия состоит из двух историй. Все они основаны на реальных событияхпересказанные так, как услышаны от реальных участников описываемых событий либо от экстрасенсов, работавших с участниками. В проекте задействованы различные специалисты, которые анализируют происходящие в кадре события, и высказывают свое мнение. Здесь и психологи, и экстрасенсы, и биоэнергетики, и врачи, и даже ведьмы. Каждый из них имеет свое собственное видение происходящего - они лишь озвучивают свои мнения. Вывод о том, кто прав, и действительно ли в основе рассказанных историй лежит мистика, или же результат самовнушения, — делает сам зритель.

programme.title: Мистические истории

programme.title: Кафе на садовой
programme.desc: Три женщины, три истории. Все они разные и по возрасту, и по характеру, у каждой из них есть своя тайна. Ольга, Ника и Валентина работают в "Кафе на Садовой" и мечтают о женском счастье. Ольга, отсидев вместо мужа тюремный срок, пытается вернуть своего сына, которого муж-предатель отдал под опеку в другую семью. Валентина не может признать, что за вечным противостоянием с владельцем кафе кроется настоящая любовь. Ника, сбежав от богатых родителей и предательства, пытается начать новую жизнь среди простых и честных людей. Чтобы найти свою настоящую любовь, каждой из них предстоит пройти нелегкий путь. Но во всех сложных жизненных ситуациях женщины всегда поддерживают друг друга и вскоре становятся настоящими подругами.

programme.title: Radio Svoboda
programme.desc: Mumins Šakirovs ir pieredzējis žurnālists un dokumentālo filmu veidotājs, kurš strādājis daudzos nozīmīgos pasākumos un karstajos punktos. Kopā ar ekspertiem viņš katru sestdienu sadala svarīgākās Krievijas un pasaules ziņas. Politika un ekonomika, kultūra un zinātne. Cenšoties saviem skatītājiem sniegt pilnvērtīgu un skaidru priekšstatu par notikumiem, nodalot svarīgus notikumus no informatīvā trokšņa.
